version_description:
*New* Filter queries by query name prefix.
QueryDB was made to share queries across multiple dbs (e.g. prod, staging, development) and thus the traditional parent-child model never worked.
Yet the design made for odd situations where queries would appear under non-applicable databases.
To reconcile the features, you can now assign databases a default prefix query name in order to automatically filter.
Need to quickly access that other query? Just adjust the query filter search box.

* Note for Cloud Sync users, for best results, update all your devices before adding the query prefix name. Otherwise, to force a re-sync, re-save the database settings on the device with the most up-to-date settings and then background-foreground the app on the device to be updated.
